items.title: This website lets you blind-test GPT-5 vs. GPT-4o—and the results may surprise you
items.description: Take this blind test to discover whether you truly prefer OpenAI's GPT-5 or the older GPT-4o—without knowing which model you're using.

items.title: Developers lose focus 1,200 times a day — how MCP could change that
items.description: One of the most impactful applications of MCP is its ability to connect AI coding assistants directly to developer tools.

items.title: Busted by the em dash — AI’s favorite punctuation mark, and how it’s blowing your cover
items.description: AI is brilliant at polishing and rephrasing. But like a child with glitter glue, you still need to supervise it.

items.title: OpenCUA’s open source computer-use agents rival proprietary models from OpenAI and Anthropic
items.description: The open source framework provides the data and training recipe for building powerful computer-use agents that challenge proprietary systems.

items.title: Meta is partnering with Midjourney and will license its technology for ‘future models and products’
items.description: Details are scarce on how much if any money is involved. And what does it mean for Midjourney's previously announced plans for an enterprise API?
